#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		string s;
        cin>>s;
        int p,q;
        cin>>p>>q;
        int len = s.size();
        sort(s.begin(),s.end());
        while(q--)
        {
        	int n;
        	cin>>n;
        	if(n<=len*p)
        	{
        		int print= (n-1)/p;
        		cout<<s[print]<<endl;
        	}
        	else cout<<-1<<endl; 
        }
	}
	return 0;
}
